channel.title: The 484+ Client! (Uber Style)
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt]The 484+ Client (Uber Style)[/size]
[color=blue]Hello MoparScapians! Im Currently Working On A 484+ Client In Uber Style Just Like JaGeX's Client (RuneScape) Only In Uber Style Which Means Better Now I Plan To Code This Using The 484 Cache (Current Cache) BlankClient (Non Coded) Hardcoded RSMV - Model Grabber Cache Packing Open Source! This Should Take 2-4Month Depends On How Quick JaGeX Update Their Client ID's Same Has Miss Silabsoft's Client Has Silab Will Drop Us In It Soon Many People Are Using There Brains And Using Silabs Ids In Their Clients
Well I Will Keep U Updated With Pics I Will Release BETA 1-2Week
Features Im Coding
RuneScape's Current Object,Items And NPC's Look 484 Gameframe (Easy) - 25% Complete Webclient Stat Icons! 100% (Fully Complete) Summoaning Hunting Construction And Many More...
Want To Help Me? Add My Msn rickscape-support@hotmail.co.uk No Annoying Appliations Needed
You Can Also Check My Site For The Updates *Ask On Msn For Link*
Items Suggested Dark Bow - Ashley (Added) Dragon Fire Sheild - Ashley (Added) Dragon Boots - Me (Added) Dragon Full Helm - Me (Added) All Perfect Skillcapes - Ashley (Added) 3RD Age Set Mage,Range,Melee - Me (Added) Fighter Hat - Me (Added) GodSword Set - Me (Added) Barrolchest Anchor - Me (Added) Currently 69 Items In The Client Well See You Soon
Pictures! Skillcapes! [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2i6828.jpg[/img] Defenders + Torso [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/nlyhx3.jpg[/img]
Soon 2 Come
I Used Dogs Client For The Gameframe! Nothing Else This Client Was Used With A Blank Base!
